post.description: Allows users to create a ticket without attachments.
Allows users to create a ticket with one or more attachments (max 3).

400.description: Validation error: Missing fields or invalid attachment count

post.description: Allows users to reply to an existing ticket without attachments.

post.summary: Reply to a ticket with attachments
post.description: Allows users to reply to an existing ticket and upload attachments.

400.description: Validation error: Missing fields or invalid attachment count

delete.description: Allows SYSOP users to initiate ticket deletion. Returns an operation key for confirmation.

message.example: Ticket deletion requires confirmation. Use the provided operation key to confirm.

400.description: Validation error: Invalid ticket ID or other issues

403.description: Unauthorized: Only SYSOP users can access this endpoint

post.description: Allows SYSOP users to confirm ticket deletion using an operation key. Deletes the ticket and its associated data.

200.description: Ticket and associated data deleted successfully

message.example: Ticket and associated data deleted successfully.

403.description: Unauthorized: Only SYSOP users can access this endpoint

get.description: Allows SYSOP users to fetch all tickets and their responses. Optionally filter by ticket status. Optional filter for ticket status (e.g., CREATED, ANSWERED, CUSTOMER_RESPONSE).

403.description: Unauthorized: Only SYSOP users can access this endpoint

get.description: Fetches a specific ticket and its associated responses by ticket ID.
Fetches a specific response by its response ID.

get.summary: Fetch all responses for a ticket
get.description: Fetches all responses associated with a specific ticket by ticket ID.
Fetches all tickets and responses for a specific user by their email address.

200.description: User tickets and responses fetched successfully

patch.description: Allows users to close a ticket. USER and PREMIUM users can only close their own tickets. Returns an error if the ticket is already closed.

403.description: Unauthorized: You cannot close this ticket

message.example: You are not authorized to close this ticket

delete.description: Allows users to delete a response they created. If the response has attachments, they are also deleted from MinIO.

403.description: Unauthorized: You can only delete your own responses

put.description: Allows users to edit their responses to tickets. Responses cannot be edited if the associated ticket is closed.

400.description: Invalid input or response cannot be edited

message.example: This response cannot be edited as the associated ticket is closed.

403.description: Unauthorized: User does not own the response

404.description: Response or associated ticket not found

put.description: Allows users to edit their own tickets. At least one of "ticketTitle" or "ticketDescription" must be provided. Tickets with "CLOSED" status cannot be edited.

400.description: Validation error or invalid ticket status

message.example: Validation error message or "This ticket is closed and cannot be edited"

403.description: Unauthorized: User is not allowed to edit this ticket

message.example: You are not authorized to edit this ticket
An error occurred while processing the request

delete.summary: Delete an attachment from a ticket or response
delete.description: Allows users to delete an attachment from either a ticket or a response.

message.example: Attachment removed successfully from the ticket.

404.description: Ticket, response, or file not found

post.summary: Add attachments to a ticket or response
post.description: Allows users to add attachments to either a ticket or a response. Maximum of 3 attachments are allowed.

message.example: Attachments added successfully to the ticket.

400.description: Invalid input or too many attachments
